Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Prohibits incarcerated individuals suffering from a substance use disorder from being prescribed medications for a different disorder
Summary: Prohibits incarcerated individuals who are determined to suffer from a substance use disorder for which there is no FDA approved addiction medications from being administered medication approved for a different disorder.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to prohibiting incarcerated individuals suffering from a substance use disorder from being prescribed medications for a different disorder
